user_question: What are the rules for beach volleyball and generate an image of a beach volleyball match?
final_answer: Beach volleyball rules include: 2 players per team, matches are best of 3 sets, each set is played to 21 points (15 in the third set), no open-hand dinks, and players must rotate serve. Image of a beach volleyball match generated. The dimensions of the court are 16 meters long and 8 meters wide.
